query:
UPDATE books SET
                        title = ?, 
                        authors = ?, 
                        publisher = ?, 
                        languages = ?, 
                        edition = ?, 
                        isbn = ?, 
                        year = ?, 
                        genres = ?, 
                        cover = ?, 
                        collection_id = ?, 
                        location_id = ?
                    WHERE id = ? AND user_id = ?
